Where were you 43 years ago when the Teton Dam burst? 
Many of you remember this tragic day, hopefully you also recall the thousands of volunteers that rushed to lend a helping hand. 
That seems to be the way that Idahoans handle disaster. https://twitter.com/museumofidaho/status/1004095306173014016 …

Safe Kids Worldwide & Union Pacific have teamed up to help educate about the dangers that train crossings can pose to children. They kindly sent a copy of “Clifford and the Railroad Crossing” to my Boise office for visiting parents and children to read.
  #Railroad #Safety pic.twitter.com/Yz8kW1cvjg

I’m disappointed that Democrats turned a bipartisan goal--legal status for Dreamers--into a bill that only had Democratic input. Offering a partisan bill that will not be considered by the Senate is not an honest attempt at solving the problem #HR6
